sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-tabs
    v-model="internalValue"
    :active-class="`${color} ${$vuetify.theme.dark ? 'black' : 'white'}--text`"
    class="v-tabs--pill"
    hide-slider
    v-bind="$attrs"
  >
    <slot />

    <slot name="items" />
  </v-tabs>
</template>

<script>
  // Mixins
  import Proxyable from 'vuetify/lib/mixins/proxyable'

  export default {
    name: 'MaterialTabs',

    mixins: [Proxyable],

    props: {
      color: {
        type: String,
        default: 'primary',
      },
    },
  }
</script>

<style lang="sass">
  .v-tabs--pill
    .v-tab,
    .v-tab:before
      border-radius: 24px

    &.v-tabs--icons-and-text
      .v-tab,
      .v-tab:before
        border-radius: 4px
</style>
